Interface ExternalTestRunnerRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AllowsNonAnnotatedFields, BuildEngineAction, BuildRule, Comparable<BuildRule>, HasNameAndType, TestRule
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TestXRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ExternalTestRunnerRule
extends TestRule
    A interface describing TestRules which support being run by an external test runner.
